text: @Milbank No he called it the "media's next hoax". That doesn't mean Coronavirus isn't real, it just means that the media is going to lie about it, exaggerate about it, and look for anyway that they can blame Trump for it. Their goal is to scare or shame people into not supporting DJT

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
